Html:
Hello,

I have a problem with some includes even if the path to the file is correct : "Warning: require_once(): URL using bad/illegal format or missing URL in /data/chroot/data2/dilps/1/Classes/PHPExcel.php on line 50 (...)"

I think it comes from php curlwrappers. But I can't disable it on my server.

Any solution?

Thank you.
We have not seen this before. What version of PHP are you using?

Got the same erroron line 50 with 

require_once PHPEXCEL_ROOT . 'PHPExcel/NamedRange.php';





PHP version 5.2.10
